page.title: 11Religion/Arts Festival
page.content: {RELIGION}The Rector of East Hoathly is Rev.P.Amos. There are no other religions besides Christianity except a Yoga Meditation Group. We belong to the Diocese of Chichester and the Bishop is Bishop Eric Kemp. The Church Wardens are Mr.Underhill and Mr.Smith of East Hoathly and Mr.Brooks and Mr.Inskip of Chiddingly. There are eight services a week not including Weddings, Funerals and Christenings. Chiddingly does not have a Sunday School but East Hoathly has a Junior Church. {ARTS FESTIVAL}An annual Arts Festival is held at Chiddingly. A programme of music, drama, art, crafts and literature is arranged for one week in October. The organisers rely on spon- sorshp from local firms to fund both professional artists and local talent. Admission is charged to the public.
